Reviews.Title: Very good!
Reviews.Author: Francisco Olivar
Reviews.Content: This laptop is is good price-quality relationship. It is basic but good, is perfect for may father.No complaints.Thanks

Reviews.Title: A good daily use laptop
Reviews.Author: 9ijnbhu8
Reviews.Content: I bought it for basic tasks like surfing internet and watching vedio on youtube.The screen is large and the specs are enough for daily use.The price is good and the laptop's quality is not bad at this price range.

Reviews.Title: If you order one of these - you'd better known what you're doing.
Reviews.Author: P. Siegel "GoPro"
Reviews.Content: This ubit seemed to me to be  very complex lap top - far more sophisticated than I was able to comprehend and operate. With no instructions, a group of 3 of us had difficulty just turning it on and even moreso, turning it off.After a long, hard struggle for three of us, (one of whom is a highly qualified computer teacher in a college here) - I had to send it back.

Reviews.Title: it works fine but
Reviews.Author: joe watson
Reviews.Content: upon placing battery in a small plastic hold down clip fell off and now the battery keeps falling out of the unit
